thread.title: Executive’s Fraud Trial Puts Valeant in Uncomfortable Light

author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: Executive’s Fraud Trial Puts Valeant in Uncomfortable Light
text:
The fraud trial of a former executive at Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc. is set to begin this week in Manhattan federal court, the first criminal prosecution to emerge from multiple investigations into the embattled pharmaceutical giant over its sales practices.
In this case, prosecutors say Valeant was the victim. Using a statute often applied to public corruption cases, the U.S. attorney’s office in Manhattan has accused the former Valeant executive, Gary Tanner, and a co-defendant, Andrew Davenport, of defrauding...
